transcript: I don't go home for the holidays and when I tell people that it gets met with very mixed reactions most of the times it's negative and usually that's because they project with their idea of what I should do or what they would do in my situation onto me you shouldn't do that with family family is the only thing you have family is the most important thing and you know what if that's you good for you but for everybody else who doesn't have that amazing experience who doesn't feel like their family or their friends or their high school or whatever is supporting the person they want to be  them
